defaults.characterLock: Same character as the attached image (Nova). Keep face, horns, eyes, outfit, and identity consistent. Keep the same voice tone across scenes.
defaults.negatives: No landscapes. No nature scenes. No volcano/lava. No aerial shots. No random objects. No text-heavy UI. No clutter.
defaults.style: premium, cinematic, calm motion, clean lighting, subtle neon accents

scenes.scene: Nova speaks to camera in a modern studio. Subtle ember glow. A small, tasteful lobster icon appears on a holographic panel behind her.
scenes.say: I’m Nova. At Business Builders, OpenClaw is the agent framework we trust to turn ideas into systems.

scenes.scene: A minimal diagram fades in: Tools → Skills → Automations. A small lobster silhouette sits near the word ‘Skills’.
scenes.say: OpenClaw isn’t a chatbot. It’s tools, skills, and automation—wired together to actually do work.

scenes.scene: Holographic cards labeled: Browser, Web Search, Files, Processes. Nova gestures softly; cards align neatly.
scenes.say: We give it hands: browser control, web search, file access, background jobs. Then we teach it the workflow.

scenes.scene: A ‘Skill’ book motif opens, showing checklists. A small lobster charm dangles from the corner like a keychain.
scenes.say: Skills are playbooks. They encode the exact steps—so the agent is repeatable, not random.

scenes.scene: A timeline shows a nightly run: discovery → transcript → rank → notes. The lobster icon highlights ‘rank’.
scenes.say: We use it to discover what matters, capture transcripts, rank signal, and save it into our knowledge base.

scenes.scene: A ‘Video’ pipeline appears: prompt → generate → chain frames → final cut. Lobster icon sits beside ‘chain frames’.
scenes.say: We even automate creative work—multi-scene video generation with consistent characters, end to end.

scenes.scene: A dashboard: ‘Reliability’ with green checks: bounded timeouts, retries, logs. A lobster stamp marks ‘approved’.
scenes.say: The difference is discipline: bounded timeouts, logs, retries. Automation you can run every day.

scenes.scene: Nova leans in slightly. Minimal text appears: ‘Your business, less chaos’. Lobster icon is subtle in corner.
scenes.say: If your business is chaos—leads, follow-ups, ops—OpenClaw is how we turn that into a machine.

scenes.scene: A clean end-to-end flow: Lead → Reply → Follow-up → Booked call → Delivered. Lobster icon nods like a mascot.
scenes.say: You don’t need more apps. You need one agentic system that keeps the loop closed.

scenes.scene: End card: Business Builders • Nova • Built on OpenClaw. A small lobster emblem sits next to OpenClaw.
scenes.say: This is OpenClaw—our framework for agents that actually ship. If you know, you know.
